page.title: 15'My Weekend Diary'
page.content:
This diary was written by Saief Morshed _ age 11.
{07.08}: I woke up. {08.43 - 09.00}: I had my breakfast while watching the 'Wide Awake Club' on television. {10.42 - 12.50}: My family went to Sidcup where we did some shopping. Afterwards we went to the ASDA departmental store in Swanley, which sells food & electrical goods. Then we went home. {13.10}: I watched 'Football Focus' on television which was very good. {13.31}: I had my dinner which was Beef pie & Potatoes. {15.50}: I watched T.V. they were showing 'Grandstand' and football. {19.00}: I watched 'Operation Crossbow' a film about Nazis making bombs in World War 2. Then I went to bed.
